member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.HideToolbar
member.summary: True to hide the viewer application’s toolbars when the document is active. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.HideMenubar
member.summary: True to hide the viewer application’s menu bar when the document is active. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.HideWindowUI
member.summary: True to hide user interface elements in the document’s window (such as scroll bars and navigation controls), leaving only the document’s contents displayed. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.FitWindow
member.summary: True to resize the document’s window to fit the size of the first displayed page. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.CenterWindow
member.summary: True to position the document’s window in the center of the screen. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.DisplayTitle
member.summary: True if the window’s title bar should display the document title taken from the Title entry in the document information/metadata. If this value is false, the title bar should instead display the name of the PDF file containing the document. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfDocumentOptions.DisplayMode
member.summary: Specifies how the document should be displayed when opened. Default value: .

members.member: Neither document outline nor thumbnail images are visible.
Thumbnail images are visible. If thumbnails and outline flags are set, thumbnails will be shown.
Full-screen mode with no menu bar, window controls, or any other window visible.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSecurity
member.summary: Encapsulates the information necessary to provide PDF document security and encryption.
member.remarks: If a user password is supplied the viewer application should prompt for a password. If a user password is not supplied no password will be requested to open the document. By correctly supplying either the user password, or the owner password, the user will be able to open the document, decrypt it and display it on the screen. Whether additional operations are allowed on a decrypted document depends on which password (if any) was supplied when the document was opened and on any access restrictions specified using this class's property.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSecurity.Encrypt
member.summary: Determines whether the document is encrypted or not.
member.remarks: You must set this property to true for the document to be encrypted and the permissions enforced.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSecurity.OwnerPassword
member.summary: The owner password that can be entered in the reader that permits full access to the document regardless of the specified user permissions.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSecurity.UserPassword
member.summary: The user password that can be entered in the reader. If this value is left empty they user will not be prompted for a password, however the user will be restricted by the specified permissions.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSecurity.Permissions
member.summary: Specifies the user permissions for the document. The values can be combined using a bitwise OR combination.
member.remarks: By default all permissions are set/allowed.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfSecurity.Use128Bit
member.summary: True to use 128 bit encryption with full permissions capability. False to use 40 bit encryption with limited permissions. The , , and permissions require this value to be true.
member.remarks: The default value is true.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Section.PdfPermissions
member.summary: Specifies the permissions available for a PDF document. These values can be combined using a bitwise OR combination.

members.member: You can use this setting alone to specify that none of the other permissions are set. It has no effect if you bitwise or this flag together with the other flags.
Set to permit printing the document when it is opened with user access permission. This is a revision 2 permission.
Set to permit modifying the document’s contents when it is opened with user access permission. Text annotations can still be added or modified. This is a revision 2 permission.
Set to permit copying text or graphics from the document when it is opened with user access permission. This is a revision 2 permission.

Set to permit adding or modifying annotations in the document when it is opened with user access permission. This permission is a revision 2 or revision 3 permission. Under revision three, the ability to copy/paste document contents is restricted other than what is specified by bit 10 (AllowAccessibleReaders).
Set to permit filling in form fields in the document when it is opened with user access permission. This is revision 3 only permission.

Set to permit extracting the text and graphics of the document for accessibility purposes or otherwise (it is most likely for accessibility reasons, but possibly for other “screen reading” purposes) when it is opened with user access permission. This is revision 3 only permission.

Set to permit the following operations when the document is opened with user access permission:Insert, rotate, or delete pages, and create bookmarks or thumbnail images even if AllowModifyContents is false. This is revision 3 only permission.

member.summary: True if the window’s title bar should display the document title taken from the Title entry in the document information/metadata. If this value is false, the title bar should instead display the name of the PDF file containing the document. Default value: false.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.ColumnSpacing

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.EndPage
member.summary: The last page of the report to render. The default value is the value for StartPage.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.StartPage
member.summary: The first page of the report to render. A value of 0 indicates that all pages are rendered. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.MarginBottom
member.summary: The bottom margin value, in inches, to set for the report. You must include an integer or decimal value followed by "in" (for example, 1in). This value overrides the report's original settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.MarginTop
member.summary: The top margin value, in inches, to set for the report. You must include an integer or decimal value followed by "in" (for example, 1in). This value overrides the report's original settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.MarginLeft
member.summary: The left margin value, in inches, to set for the report. You must include an integer or decimal value followed by "in" (for example, 1in). This value overrides the report's original settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.MarginRight
member.summary: The right margin value, in inches, to set for the report. You must include an integer or decimal value followed by "in" (for example, 1in). This value overrides the report's original settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.PageHeight
member.summary: The page height value, in inches, to set for the report. You must include an integer or decimal value followed by "in" (for example, 1in). This value overrides the report's original settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.PageWidth
member.summary: The page width value, in inches, to set for the report. You must include an integer or decimal value followed by "in" (for example, 1in). This value overrides the report's original settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.Encrypt
member.summary: Determines whether the document is encrypted or not.
member.remarks: You must set this property to true for the document to be encrypted and the permissions enforced.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.OwnerPassword
member.summary: The owner password that can be entered in the reader that permits full access to the document regardless of the specified user permissions.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.UserPassword
member.summary: The user password that can be entered in the reader. If this value is left empty they user will not be prompted for a password, however the user will be restricted by the specified permissions.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.Permissions
member.summary: Specifies the user permissions for the document. The values can be combined using a bitwise OR combination.
member.remarks: By default all permissions are set/allowed.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.Use128Bit
member.summary: True to use 128 bit encryption with full permissions capability. False to use 40 bit encryption with limited permissions. The , , and permissions require this value to be true.
member.remarks: The default value is true.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.PrintLayoutMode
member.summary: Specifies layout mode to be used for PDF document.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.WatermarkTitle
member.summary: Specifies watermark title for PDF document.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.WatermarkFont
member.summary: Specifies watermark font for PDF document.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.WatermarkAngle
member.summary: Specifies watermark angle for PDF document.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.WatermarkColor
member.summary: Specifies watermark color for PDF document.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SizeToFit
member.summary: Determines whether PDF pages are fit to the selected paper size or not.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureCertificateFileName
member.summary: Gets/sets the signing certificate file name location

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureCertificatePassword
member.summary: Gets/sets the signing certificate password

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureCertificationLevel
member.summary: Gets/sets type of the signature certification
member.remarks: This value parsed from string. Possible values: NotCertified, NoChangesAllowed, FormFilling or FormFillingAnnotations

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureVisibilityType
member.summary: Gets/sets visible type for the signature
member.remarks: This value parsed from string. Default value: Invisible. Possible values: Invisible, Text, Image, ImageText

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureSignDate
member.summary: Gets/sets the sign date. Default value is DateTime.Now
member.remarks: Value must be a serialized DateTime value

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureContact
member.summary: Gets/sets the signing contact.
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings. Required 'contact' parameter passed via the 'SignatureContact' field. Optional parameters (visible and showLabel) passed via the 'SignatureContactVisible' and the 'SignatureContactShowLabel' fields

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureReason
member.summary: Gets/sets the signing reason.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureLocation
member.summary: Gets/sets the signing location.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureTimeStamp
member.summary: Gets the settings for TSA server
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings. Required 'serverUrl' parameter passed via the 'SignatureTimeStamp' field. Optional parameters (user and password) passed via the 'SignatureTimeStampUser' and the 'SignatureTimeStampPassword' fields

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureNameShowLabel
member.summary: Gets/sets value, indicating that label for the name of the certificate should be shown
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureNameVisible
member.summary: Gets/sets value visibility for the name of the certificate. If true, then the value will be written
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureDistinguishedShowLabel
member.summary: Gets/sets value, indicating that label for the Distinguished Name of the certificate should be shown
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureDistinguishedNameVisible
member.summary: Gets/sets value visibility for the Distinguished Name of the certificate. If true, then the value will be written
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureStampImageFileName
member.summary: Gets/sets the file location for image shown on signature

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureStampBounds
member.summary: Gets/sets the bounds of the signature
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings. Should be passed as serialized RectangleF struct.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureStampTextRectangle
member.summary: Gets/sets area where text should be placed. By default entire signature area will be used.
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings. Should be passed as serialized RectangleF struct.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureStampImageRectangle
member.summary: Gets/sets area where image should be placed. By default entire signature rectangle will be used.
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings. Should be passed as serialized RectangleF struct.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureStampTextAlignment
member.summary: Gets/sets stamp text alignment
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings. Should be passed as serialized Alignment struct.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureStampImageAlignment
member.summary: Gets/sets stamp image alignment inside signature
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings. Should be passed as serialized Alignment struct.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureStampFont
member.summary: gets/sets stamp text font
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings. Required 'familyName' parameter passed via the 'SignatureStampFont' field. Optional parameters passed via 'SignatureStampFontStyle', 'SignatureStampFontName', 'SignatureStampFontSize', 'SignatureStampFontCharset', 'SignatureStampFontVerticalText' fields

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureStampTextColor
member.summary: Gets/sets stamp text color
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings. Should be passed as serialized Color struct.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureStampPageIndex
member.summary: Gets/sets index of the page, where signature should be placed
member.remarks: This value parsed from strings. First page have index 1

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.Settings.SignatureStampCustomText
member.summary: Gets/sets the custom text that drawn on signature

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion
member.summary: Output pdf conformance level. Allows to export to PDF/A.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.Pdf12
member.summary: PDF version 1.2. This is the native file format of Acrobat 3.0.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.Pdf13
member.summary: PDF version 1.3. This is the native file format of Acrobat 4.0.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.Pdf14
member.summary: PDF version 1.4. This is the native file format of Acrobat 5.0.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.Pdf15
member.summary: PDF version 1.5.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.Pdf16
member.summary: PDF version 1.6.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.Pdf17
member.summary: PDF version 1.7.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.PDFA1b
member.summary: PDF/A-1b level, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PDF/A

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.PDFA1a
member.summary: PDF/A-1a level, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PDF/A

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.PDFA2b
member.summary: PDF/A-2b level, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PDF/A

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.PDFA2u
member.summary: PDF/A-2u level, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PDF/A

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.PDFA2a
member.summary: PDF/A-2a level, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PDF/A

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.PDFA3b
member.summary: PDF/A-3b level, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PDF/A

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.PDFA3u
member.summary: PDF/A-3u level, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PDF/A

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfVersion.PDFA3a
member.summary: PDF/A-3a level, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PDF/A

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.DisplayMode
member.summary: Used to specify .

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.DisplayMode.None
member.summary: Neither document outline nor thumbnail images are visible.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.DisplayMode.Outlines
member.summary: The document outline is visible.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.DisplayMode.Thumbs
member.summary: Thumbnail images are visible. If thumbnails and outline flags are set, thumbnails will be shown.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.DisplayMode.FullScreen
member.summary: Full-screen mode with no menu bar, window controls, or any other window visible.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfPermissions
member.summary: Specifies the permissions available for a PDF document. These values can be combined using a bitwise OR combination.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfPermissions.Default
member.summary: The default permissions.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfPermissions.None
member.summary: You can use this setting alone to specify that none of the other permissions are set. It has no effect if you bitwise or this flag together with the other flags.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfPermissions.AllowPrint
member.summary: Set to permit printing the document when it is opened with user access permission. This is a revision 2 permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfPermissions.AllowModifyContents
member.summary: Set to permit modifying the document’s contents when it is opened with user access permission. Text annotations can still be added or modified. This is a revision 2 permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfPermissions.AllowCopy
member.summary: Set to permit copying text or graphics from the document when it is opened with user access permission. This is a revision 2 permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfPermissions.AllowModifyAnnotations
member.summary: Set to permit adding or modifying annotations in the document when it is opened with user access permission. This permission is a revision 2 or revision 3 permission. Under revision three, the ability to copy/paste document contents is restricted other than what is specified by bit 10 (AllowAccessibleReaders).

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfPermissions.AllowFillIn
member.summary: Set to permit filling in form fields in the document when it is opened with user access permission. This is revision 3 only permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfPermissions.AllowAccessibleReaders
member.summary: Set to permit extracting the text and graphics of the document for accessibility purposes or otherwise (it is most likely for accessibility reasons, but possibly for other “screen reading” purposes) when it is opened with user access permission. This is revision 3 only permission.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Page.PdfPermissions.AllowAssembly
member.summary: Set to permit the following operations when the document is opened with user access permission:Insert, rotate, or delete pages, and create bookmarks or thumbnail images even if AllowModifyContents is false. This is revision 3 only permission.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Pdf.Enums.ImageInterpolation
member.summary: Interpolation value of images. Allows to swtich on/off image interpolation during export to PDF.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Rendering.Text.IFormattingService
member.summary: Providers functionality for values converting and formatting according to the current language.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Rendering.Text.IFormattingService.Format(System.Object,GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Extensibility.Rendering.Components.IStyle)
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the specified value using and according to the language settings defined in the report or current server language.
member.remarks: According to RDL specs. report item language takes precedence over report language and everything fallbacks on a default (server -- whatever it is) language.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Rendering.Text.IFormattingService.Format(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the specified value consistent with the current report language settings.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Rendering.Text.IFormattingService.Format(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the specified value consistent with the current report language settings and using the specified format string.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Rendering.Text.IFormattingService.GetFormattingService(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a for the specified language. In the case of same language returns itself, otherwise it will be created a new instance.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Rendering.Text.IFormattingService.GetFormattingService(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Extensibility.Rendering.Components.IReportItem)
member.summary: Returns a for the language which is used for given report item. In the case of same language returns itself, otherwise it will be created a new instance.
